channel.title: Game question
channel.description:
Well, a few years ago I saw this preview of a game. The question is, what game was it? Now you cant tell me :rolleyes: so Ill describe the game a bit.
OK. The story begins with that the main characters dad got murdered, and the main character wants revenge. In the begining you start at a harbor. Its a chinese/japanese character by the way. What you have to do (from what I saw in the preview) is to fight other people for money. I havent seen the rest of it.
This is all I can think of right now. Ask anything that you need to know and Ill try to answer.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Game question
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Yea I know. I have some more info :P. When you begin, you come to the harbor from a big ship. Also, its not a game you can download like warrock or gunz, but you had to buy it on a cd.

Read full topic

item.title: Game question
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

That could be one of seven thousand Japanese RPGs with that exact plotline.

Read full topic

@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

No, it cant be red steal because its for the wii, and I saw the preview a few years ago. Maby the fighting part can be replaced with arm wrestling, but im not sure.

If this is what it is like, then no its not the game I mean. Its a more modern looking game. With modern I mean clothes and stuff are from this time.

item.title: Game question
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Could be Grandia 1 for the PS1

Missing Father
Starts in a Harbour Town
Japanese Manga type graphics
Top down RPG

Google it and let me know

Read full topic
